targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  TO_TIMESTAMP("año"::text, 'YYYY') as "time",
  "02_evaluation" as "a_metric"
FROM "Theme 1 synthesis"
WHERE ${Interval}::integer = "año"::integer
ORDER BY 1,2

list.definition:
SELECT
	schema_name
FROM
	information_schema.schemata
WHERE
	schema_name !~ '^(pg_)' AND
	schema_name != 'information_schema' AND
	schema_name != 'topology' AND
	schema_name != 'cron'
list.label: Proyecto
list.name: SCHEMA
list.query:
SELECT
	schema_name
FROM
	information_schema.schemata
WHERE
	schema_name !~ '^(pg_)' AND
	schema_name != 'information_schema' AND
	schema_name != 'topology' AND
	schema_name != 'cron'

list.definition:
SELECT
	 table_name
FROM
	information_schema.tables
WHERE
	table_schema = '${SCHEMA}' AND
	table_type = 'BASE TABLE' AND
        table_name ~ '^(0|1|A|B|Theme)'
list.label: Indice
list.name: INDEX_TABLES
list.query:
SELECT
	 table_name
FROM
	information_schema.tables
WHERE
	table_schema = '${SCHEMA}' AND
	table_type = 'BASE TABLE' AND
        table_name ~ '^(0|1|A|B|Theme)'

list.definition: select json from indexes_sunburst where validity_range && '["${YEAR}-01-01 00:00:00+00","${YEAR}-12-31 23:59:59+00"]'::tstzrange ;
list.name: INDEXES_SUNBURST
list.query: select json from indexes_sunburst where validity_range && '["${YEAR}-01-01 00:00:00+00","${YEAR}-12-31 23:59:59+00"]'::tstzrange ;
